faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using Blinkoo

items.question: How can I reserve an offer?
items.answer: Simply browse available offers, click 'Reserve' to secure your spot and receive a unique QR code or 6-digit code for redemption. No fees, instant confirmation.

items.question: Is there a fee for using Blinkoo?
items.answer: Blinkoo is completely free for customers. Merchants only pay a small commission when offers are successfully redeemed. No upfront costs or subscriptions.

items.question: What if I can't make it on time?
items.answer: Offers are time-limited by design. If you can't make it, your reservation will expire and the offer becomes available to others. Always check the expiration time before reserving.

items.question: How do merchants benefit?
items.answer: Merchants fill off-peak hours with targeted customers. They control inventory, pricing, and timing. Average merchants see a 35-40% increase in off-peak traffic with no upfront costs.

items.question: Are offers really limited?
items.answer: Yes! Each offer has a limited quantity to create urgency and exclusivity. Once an offer is reserved, it disappears. This ensures offers are real and impactful.

items.question: How can I redeem my reservation?
items.answer: Visit the venue during the active offer time, show your 6-digit code or QR code to staff and enjoy the discount. Redemption is instant and simple.

items.question: Can I reserve multiple offers?
items.answer: Yes, you can reserve multiple offers from different merchants. Each offer has its own time limit and redemption process. Check your 'My Reservations' section to manage them all.

items.question: What types of businesses use Blinkoo?
items.answer: Restaurants, cafes, gyms, wellness centers, entertainment venues, and more. Any local business that wants to attract traffic during off-peak hours.

form.createSubtitle: Fill in the details below to create a new offer
form.editSubtitle: Update your offer details and settings
form.title: Offer Title
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what makes this offer special...
form.initialTimeSlotDescription: Define the first available time slot. You can add more slots later from the offer details page.
form.perUserLimitTooltip: Maximum number of offers that one user can reserve for this offer. Leave empty or 0 for unlimited.
form.cooldownMinutesTooltip: Time in minutes that a user must wait between reservations for the same offer. Prevents too quick multiple reservations.
form.geofenceKmTooltip: Maximum distance in kilometers from the venue where users can see and reserve this offer. 0 means no geographical restriction.
